original_title: How It's Made: The Fun Stuff
overview: Boomerangs and candy canes, cheesecake and roller skates - what could be more fun?  Well, wait until you see how they're made!  This thirty segment collection zips you through the topsy-turvy processes that produce some of our most favorite foods and playthings.  How do you put the stripes on a candy cane?  How do you get the details on a miniature train?  The roller-coaster production lines of stickers, sombreros, strobe lights and so much more are just waiting to be examined and explored in three-and-a-half hours of the fun stuff on How It's Made.
title: How It's Made: The Fun Stuff
